remarks:
The intersection of two Cartesian products.  Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.) 

---

 The intersection of two cross products.  Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement: inxp $p |- ( ( A X. B ) i^i ( C X. D ) ) = ( ( A i^i C ) X. ( B i^i D ) ) $.
